spec_data.Name: libexif
spec_data.Description:
Most digital cameras produce EXIF files, which are JPEG files with
extra tags that contain information about the image. The EXIF library
allows you to parse an EXIF file and read the data from those tags.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 07:50:17 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Library for extracting extra information from image files
